title: 500 TAKES OVER The Big Apple – Announcing #500NYC Week!
content: With demo day San Francisco and Mountain View out of the way, there was only one place for 500 to go next – New York City! This week, we're featuring our awesome #500Strong NYC founders with a new episode of the Startup Founders Podcast every day. To kick things off, I speak with Steven Van Wel, CEO and co-founder of Karma. Listen Now: iTunes Stitcher RSS feed Here's a schedule of all the interviews we'll have this week: Monday Steven van Wel, CEO and co-founder of Karma Tuesday Brian Wang, CEO and co-founder of Fitocracy Wednesday Zoli Honig, co-founder of Chalkable Thursday Bernard Yoo, co-founder of Bombfell Friday Amanda Steinberg, founder of DailyWorth Shail Goldman, 500's NYC Venture Partner If you're a kickass NYC founder (or an awesome founder from anywhere on the planet), we want YOU to join our next batch of startups – Batch 007. Get your application in before the deadline on August 16th! Apply NOW.
